mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckillId, sk.user_phone, sk.state, sk.createTime, s.seckillId "seckill.seckill_id", s.name "seckill.name", s.number "seckill.number", s.startTime "seckill.start_time", s.endTime "seckill.end_time", s.createTime "seckill.create_Time" FROM success_killed sk INNER JOIN seckill s ON sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id WHERE sk.seckill_id=#{seckillId}
